ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: I hardly think that being able to solo is the measure of whether a class is balanced. ... From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@pge.com] Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
I hardly think that being able to solo is the measure of whether a class is
balanced.

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 1:53 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


Bards are way overpowered from 27 to about 40th due to Charm. The combo of
charm plus speed faster then sow is pretty overpowered. Post 40th bards
slowly start losing power till 53 with Song of Twilight. With SoT you can
solo anything in the game that this song will stick on. The only place
bards are really weak is in raid situations, in areas with 54+ mobs, or when
grouped with an Enchanter.

As for DDD it is great for duels as very few people expect a bard to
suddenly let loose with a nice nuke like that.

Personally I am surprised the VI has not added mana usage to 27th lvl charm
to balance it. It is a hideously power song :)

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 10:42 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


At 11:20 AM 2/21/01 -0500, you wrote:
>all I can say is (excuse my language) what a fucking joke. 10 points per
>level above level 45? Well damn, I do an extra 100 hp of damage with DDD,
>it's still a complete and utter waste of a spell slot. I'm really going to
>spend all my mana on 400 points of damage.
>
>I'm so disappointed it hurts. Why bother trying to "balance" the classes if
>you're going to fall so short.
>
>Draelon Stormsong

Why bother trying to discuss class balance if you're not going to even look
at the possibility
that bards are overpowered already? And if you won't accept that if bards
are currently overpowered
compared to other classes as a whole that they won't get major improvements
while some other
classes will, then I predict you are about to be even more disappointed.
